content.eamr: ( ing-2 "2 cups assorted wild mushrooms, chopped" )

content.text: 1/4 cup fresh herbs; tarragon, parsley, chives, diced
content.eamr: ( ing-8 "1/4 cup fresh herbs; tarragon, parsley, chives, diced" )

content.text: 0) Melt butter and saute Broccoflower, mushrooms, onions and garlic for 10 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Melt"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "butter"@8:14 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-0-1 "saute"@19:24 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "Broccoflower"@25:37 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "mushrooms"@39:48 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "onions"@50:56 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "garlic"@61:67 / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-0-0 "10 minutes"@72:82 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Remove sauteed ingredients and place aside.
2) In same pan, cook the rice by adding chicken stock one-cup at a time stirring until well incorporated before adding the next cup.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "cook"@16:20 / AC
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "same pan"@6:14 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "the rice"@21:29 / FOOD )
		:simultaneous ( ac-2-1 "adding"@33:39 / AC
			:ppt ( ing-6 "chicken stock"@40:53 / FOOD )
			:mnr ( "one-cup at a time"@54:71 / OTHER )
			:simultaneous ( ac-2-2 "stirring"@72:80 / AC
				:until ( cond-2-0 "until well incorporated"@81:104 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
				:duration ( cond-2-1 "before adding the next cup"@105:131 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
			)
		)
	)
)

content.text: 3) Once chicken stock is absorbed and rice is tender, stir in nutmeg, herbs and season with salt and pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "stir in"@54:61 / AC
		:when ( cond-3-0 "Once chicken stock is absorbed and rice is tender"@3:52 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "nutmeg"@62:68 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "herbs"@70:75 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "season"@80:86 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-10 "salt and pepper"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Once rice risotto is cooked, stir in the sauteed ingredients, salt and pepper to taste.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "stir in"@32:39 / AC
		:ppt ( "the sauteed ingredients"@40:63 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "salt and pepper"@65:80 / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-4-0 "to taste"@81:89 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( cond-4-0 "Once rice risotto is cooked"@3:30 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Stir in Parmesan cheese before serving.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-9 "Parmesan cheese"@11:26 / FOOD )
		:duration ( cond-5-0 "before serving"@27:41 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
